news.title: Under Water Again – When Will Britain Learn How to Manage Floods?
news.summary: Yet again, distressing images of flood damage and destruction in northern England are prompting calls for further investment in UK flood defences and fearful talk of climate change.

news.title: Those calling for bigger flood defences don't understand the complexity of UK flooding
news.summary: We've seen some pretty extreme rainfall recently in the UK, and as a result the flooding problem is spreading.

blogs.title: Lake mud can offer a crucial long-term perspective on flooding
blogs.summary: The severe flooding that has hit much of northern England during the last few weeks (and northeastern Scotland right now) has generated significant discussion and debate about why floods happen, how often they occur and what we can do about it. The fact is
